languages.text: Перехватив вашу руку, блюстительница грубо и хрипло смеется, а затем бьет вас в живот. По ребрам. По спине. И по лицу. Не дожидаясь, пока вы придете в себя, женщина грубо зашвыривает вас в угол к таким же оборванцам, драющим палубу, судя по табличке на стене, отсека Тета-54. Нижние палубы. Вам пора работать, пошевеливайтесь.

traits.locale_text: Перехватив вашу руку, Арбитр грубо и хрипло смеется, а затем бьет вас в живот. По ребрам. По спине. И по лицу. Не дожидаясь, пока вы придете в себя, женщина грубо зашвыривает вас в угол к таким же оборванцам, драющим палубу, судя по табличке на стене, отсека Тета-54. Нижние палубы. Вам пора работать, пошевеливайтесь.

languages.text: The enforcer intercepts your hand, laughs gruffly and hoarsely, then punches you in the stomach. Then the ribs. Then the back. And finally, the face. Before you can regain your footing, the woman tosses you unceremoniously into a corner where similarly ragged people are scrubbing the deck — according to the sign on the bulkhead, this is Bay Theta 54. The lower decks. You have work to do. You need to get moving.
languages.original_text: Перехватив вашу руку, блюстительница грубо и хрипло смеется, а затем бьет вас в живот. По ребрам. По спине. И по лицу. Не дожидаясь, пока вы придете в себя, женщина грубо зашвыривает вас в угол к таким же оборванцам, драющим палубу, судя по табличке на стене, отсека Тета-54. Нижние палубы. Вам пора работать, пошевеливайтесь.

traits.locale_text: The guard intercepts your hand, laughs gruffly and hoarsely, then punches you in the stomach. Then the ribs. Then the back. And finally the face. Before you can regain your footing, the woman tosses you unceremoniously into a corner where ragged people like yourself are scrubbing the floor of what a sign on the wall says is Chamber Theta 54. The lower decks. You have work to do. Move it.

The guard intercepts your hand, laughs gruffly and hoarsely, then punches you in the stomach. Then the ribs. Then the back. And finally the face. Before you can regain your footing, the woman tosses you unceremoniously into a corner where ragged people like yourself are scrubbing the floor of what a sign on the wall says is Chamber Theta 54. The lower decks. You have work to do. Move it.

Before you can regain your footing, the woman tosses you unceremoniously into a corner where ragged people like yourself are scrubbing the floor of what a sign indicates is Chamber Theta 54. The lower decks. You have work to do. Move it.

The enforcer intercepts the Rogue Trader's hand, laughs gruffly and hoarsely, then punches {mf|him|her} in the stomach. Then the ribs. Then the back. And finally, the face. Before the Rogue Trader can regain {mf|his|her} footing, the woman tosses {mf|him|her} unceremoniously into a corner where similarly ragged people are scrubbing the deck — according to the sign on the bulkhead, this is Bay Theta 54. The lower decks. The Rogue Trader has work to do. {mf|He|She} needs to get moving.

The enforcer intercepts the Rogue Trader's hand, laughs gruffly and hoarsely, then punches {mf|him|her} in the stomach. Then the ribs. Then the back. And finally, the face. Before the Rogue Trader can regain {mf|his|her} footing, the woman tosses {mf|him|her} unceremoniously into a corner where similarly ragged people are scrubbing the deck — according to the sign on the bulkhead, this is Bay Theta 54. The lower decks. The Rogue Trader has work to do. {mf|He|She} needs to get moving.

The enforcer intercepts your hand, laughs gruffly and hoarsely, then punches you in the stomach. Then the ribs. Then the back. And finally, the face. Before you can regain your footing, the woman tosses you unceremoniously into a corner where similarly ragged people are scrubbing the deck — according to the sign on the bulkhead, this is Bay Theta 54. The lower decks. You have work to do. You need to get moving.

languages.text: 那个执法者挡住了你的拳头，粗声粗气地大笑起来，随后一拳捣在了你的肚子上，之后是肋骨和背部，最后是脸。你还没来得及站起来，这个女人就毫不留情地把你丢到了角落里，那里也有同样穿着褴褛衣衫的人在清洗甲板。舱壁上的标志显示，这里是下层甲板的西塔54区。你还有事情要做，你得开始行动了。
languages.original_text: The enforcer intercepts your hand, laughs gruffly and hoarsely, then punches you in the stomach. Then the ribs. Then the back. And finally, the face. Before you can regain your footing, the woman tosses you unceremoniously into a corner where similarly ragged people are scrubbing the deck — according to the sign on the bulkhead, this is Bay Theta 54. The lower decks. You have work to do. You need to get moving.

traits.locale_text: 那个执法者挡住了你的拳头，粗声粗气地大笑起来，随后一拳捣在了你的肚子上，之后是肋骨和背部，最后是脸。你还没来得及站起来，这个女人就毫不留情地把你丢到了角落里，那里也有同样穿着褴褛衣衫的人在清洗甲板。舱壁上的标志显示，这里是下层甲板的西塔54区。你还有事情要做，你得开始行动了。

languages.text: La guardia intercepta tu golpe, se ríe con aspereza y te da un puñetazo en el estómago. Luego en las costillas. Después en la espalda. Y, por último, en la cara. Antes de que puedas recuperar el equilibrio, la guardia te empuja con brusquedad a una esquina donde otras personas harapientas están fregando la cubierta. Según la señal de la mampara, esta es la bahía Theta 54. Las cubiertas inferiores. Tienes trabajo que hacer. En marcha.
languages.original_text: The enforcer intercepts your hand, laughs gruffly and hoarsely, then punches you in the stomach. Then the ribs. Then the back. And finally, the face. Before you can regain your footing, the woman tosses you unceremoniously into a corner where similarly ragged people are scrubbing the deck — according to the sign on the bulkhead, this is Bay Theta 54. The lower decks. You have work to do. You need to get moving.

traits.locale_text: La guardia intercepta el golpe del Comerciante Independiente, se ríe con aspereza y le da un puñetazo en el estómago. Luego en las costillas. Después en la espalda. Y, por último, en la cara. Antes de que pueda recuperar el equilibrio, la guardia {mf|le|la} empuja con brusquedad a una esquina donde otras personas harapientas están fregando la cubierta. Según la señal de la mampara, esta es la bahía Theta 54. Las cubiertas inferiores. {mf|El|La} Comerciante tiene trabajo que hacer. Tiene que salir de aquí.

languages.text: 執行官はあなたの手を遮り、不機嫌そうに声を荒げて笑い、腹にパンチを入れる。次に肋骨。そして背中。最後に顔面だ。あなたが立ち直る前に、同じようにボロボロの人々が甲板を磨いている場所の隅に、女はあなたを無造作に放り込む。隔壁の看板によれば、ここはベイ・シータ54。下甲板だ。あなたにはやるべきことがあり、移動しなければならない。
languages.original_text: The enforcer intercepts your hand, laughs gruffly and hoarsely, then punches you in the stomach. Then the ribs. Then the back. And finally, the face. Before you can regain your footing, the woman tosses you unceremoniously into a corner where similarly ragged people are scrubbing the deck — according to the sign on the bulkhead, this is Bay Theta 54. The lower decks. You have work to do. You need to get moving.

traits.locale_text: 執行官はローグトレーダーの手を遮り、不機嫌そうに声を荒げて笑い、腹にパンチを入れる。次に肋骨。そして背中。最後に顔面だ。ローグトレーダーが立ち直る前に、同じようにボロボロの人々が甲板を磨いている場所の隅に、女はローグトレーダーを無造作に放り込む。隔壁の看板によれば、ここはベイ・シータ54。下甲板だ。ローグトレーダーにはやるべきことがあり、移動しなければならない。

languages.text: Die Enforcerin fängt deine Hand ab, lacht rau auf und schlägt dir dann in die Magengrube. Dann in die Rippen. Dann auf den Rücken. Und schließlich ins Gesicht. Bevor du dich sammeln kannst, wirft dich die Frau in eine Ecke, in der einige ähnlich zerlumpte Leute bereits das Deck schrubben. Laut dem Schild auf dem Schott ist das hier Modul Theta 54. Die Unterdecks. Du hast einiges zu tun. Du musst hier weg.
languages.original_text: The enforcer intercepts your hand, laughs gruffly and hoarsely, then punches you in the stomach. Then the ribs. Then the back. And finally, the face. Before you can regain your footing, the woman tosses you unceremoniously into a corner where similarly ragged people are scrubbing the deck — according to the sign on the bulkhead, this is Bay Theta 54. The lower decks. You have work to do. You need to get moving.

traits.locale_text: Die Enforcerin fängt deine Hand ab, lacht rau auf und schlägt dir dann in die Magengrube. Dann in die Rippen. Dann auf den Rücken. Und schließlich ins Gesicht. Bevor du dich sammeln kannst, wirft dich die Frau in eine Ecke, in der einige ähnlich zerlumpte Leute bereits das Deck schrubben. Laut dem Schild auf dem Schott ist das hier Modul Theta 54. Die Unterdecks. Du hast einiges zu tun. Du musst hier weg.

Die Enforcerin fängt die Hand {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} ab, lacht grob und rau und schlägt {mf|ihr|ihm} dann in den Magen. Dann in die Rippen. Dann auf den Rücken. Und schließlich ins Gesicht. Bevor {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} sich wieder sammeln kann, wirft die Frau {mf|ihn|sie} in eine Ecke, in der einige ähnlich zerlumpte Leute schon dabei sind, das Deck zu schrubben. Dem Schild auf dem Schott nach zu urteilen, ist das hier Modul Theta 54. Die Unterdecks. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hat Arbeit vor sich. {mf|Er|Muss} sich in Bewegung setzen.

languages.text: L'exécutante pare votre coup, éclate d'un rire gras et bourru et vous frappe en plein dans l'estomac. Puis dans les côtes. Puis dans le dos. Et enfin, au visage. Avant que vous ne puissiez reprendre votre souffle, l'exécutante vous pousse sans ménagement dans un coin où d'autres personnes vêtues des mêmes guenilles récurent le pont. D'après ce qui est inscrit sur la cloison, il s'agit de la baie Thêta 54. Vous avez du pain sur la planche. Il ne faut pas traîner.
languages.original_text: The enforcer intercepts your hand, laughs gruffly and hoarsely, then punches you in the stomach. Then the ribs. Then the back. And finally, the face. Before you can regain your footing, the woman tosses you unceremoniously into a corner where similarly ragged people are scrubbing the deck — according to the sign on the bulkhead, this is Bay Theta 54. The lower decks. You have work to do. You need to get moving.

traits.locale_text: L'exécutante intercepte la main {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, éclate d'un rire gras et bourru et {mf|le|la} frappe en plein dans l'estomac. Puis dans les côtes. Puis dans le dos. Et enfin, au visage. Avant qu'{mf|il|elle} ne puisse reprendre son souffle, l'exécutante pousse sans ménagement {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} dans un coin où d'autres personnes vêtues des mêmes guenilles récurent le pont. D'après ce qui est inscrit sur la cloison, il s'agit de la baie Thêta 54. Les ponts inférieurs. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a du pain sur la planche. {mf|Il|Elle} doit s'activer.

languages.text: İnfazcı elini yakalıyor, sert ve boğuk bir kahkaha atıyor, ardından karnını yumrukluyor. Sonra kaburgalarını. Sırtını. En sonunda da yüzünü. Kadın, sen kendini toparlayamadan seni güvertedeki aynı giyimli, yerleri temizleyen insanların yanına fırlatıyor. Bölme panelindeki yazıya göre burası Thita 54 Bölmesi. Alt güvertelerdesin. Bir şeyler yapman gerekiyor. Harekete geçmelisin.
languages.original_text: The enforcer intercepts your hand, laughs gruffly and hoarsely, then punches you in the stomach. Then the ribs. Then the back. And finally, the face. Before you can regain your footing, the woman tosses you unceremoniously into a corner where similarly ragged people are scrubbing the deck — according to the sign on the bulkhead, this is Bay Theta 54. The lower decks. You have work to do. You need to get moving.
